## version-file package

Generates a `version.json` file containing data extracted from the `package.json` file.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VersionFileGenerator](./version-file.versionfilegenerator.md) | Generates a verson file with based on a package.json file. Usually used during the build stage of an App release to a public assets folder. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IVersionFileConfigOptions](./version-file.iversionfileconfigoptions.md) | Available Configuration Options for the [VersionFileGenerator](./version-file.versionfilegenerator.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [IVersionFileData](./version-file.iversionfiledata.md) | Data passed to EJS render function. |
